feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [librenms/librenms] LibreNMS Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Stored in GitHub repository librenms/librenms prior to 23.9.0.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-4982
  • https://github.com/librenms/librenms/commit/2c5960631c49f7414f61b6d4dcd305b07da05769
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/d3c2dd8a-883c-400e-a1a7-326c3fd37b9e
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-m6jj-fgmh-3p8r

entry.title: [froala/wysiwyg-editor] Froala Editor Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
Froala Editor v4.0.1 to v4.1.1 was discovered to contain a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-41592
  • https://hacker.soarescorp.com/cve/2023-41592/
  • https://owasp.org/Top10/A03_2021-Injection/
  • https://owasp.org/www-project-top-ten/
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hvpq-7vcc-5hj5

entry.title: [centreon/centreon] Centreon allows SNMP trap SQL Injection
entry.content:
Centreon 3.4.x (fixed in Centreon 18.10.0 and Centreon web 2.8.27) allows SNMP trap SQL Injection.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-19281
  • https://documentation.centreon.com/docs/centreon/en/latest/release_notes/centreon-18.10/centreon-18.10.0.html
  • https://documentation.centreon.com/docs/centreon/en/latest/release_notes/centreon-2.8/centreon-2.8.27.html
  • https://github.com/centreon/centreon-archived/pull/6627
  • https://github.com/centreon/centreon-archived/pull/7069
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-w2xf-4gg9-87wr

entry.title: [centreon/centreon] Centreon XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
Centreon 3.4.x (fixed in Centreon 18.10.0) allows XSS via the Service field to the main.php?p=20201 URI, as demonstrated by the "Monitoring > Status Details > Services" screen.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-19311
  • https://documentation.centreon.com/docs/centreon/en/latest/release_notes/centreon-18.10/centreon-18.10.0.html
  • http://www.roothc.com.br/1349-2/
  • https://github.com/centreon/centreon-archived/pull/6632
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8vh5-j6xj-5953

entry.title: [snipe/snipe-it] Server-Side Request Forgery in snipe/snipe-it
entry.content:
Admin users on the external network can perform blind POST-based SSRF (issue requests on behalf of the server into the internal network) via the Slack Integration. This vulnerability is capable of port-scanning of the internal network, issue POST requests to web servers on the internal network which can be escalated to higher-impact.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-4075
  • https://github.com/snipe/snipe-it/commit/4612b9e711b3ff5d2bcddbec5b18866d25f8e34e
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/4386fd8b-8c80-42bb-87b8-b506c46597de
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-553q-hpvp-q8pc

entry.title: [snipe/snipe-it] snipe-it is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
snipe-it is vulnerable to Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting').

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-3938
  • https://github.com/snipe/snipe-it/commit/9ed1442bd124710f4178992cc4eca5236c7396b9
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/198a0d67-9189-4170-809b-0f8aea43b063
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2cqg-q7jm-j35c

entry.title: [centreon/centreon] Centreon SQL Injection
entry.content:
Centreon 3.4.x (fixed in Centreon 18.10.0 and Centreon web 2.8.24) allows SQL Injection via the searchVM parameter to the main.php?p=20408 URI.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-19312
  • https://documentation.centreon.com/docs/centreon/en/latest/release_notes/centreon-18.10/centreon-18.10.0.html

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5jxp-4x68-mhqc

entry.title: [centreon/centreon] Centreon RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
There is Remote Code Execution in Centreon 3.4.6 including Centreon Web 2.8.23 via the RPN value in the Virtual Metric form in centreonGraph.class.php.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-11587
  • https://documentation.centreon.com/docs/centreon/en/latest/release_notes/centreon-2.8/centreon-2.8.24.html
  • https://github.com/centreon/centreon-archived/pull/6263
  • https://github.com/centreon/centreon-archived/pull/6263/commits/fb438e6aaf133cc5f9d25130653ba8fdc6ecf51f
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c8qc-cp8v-prpx

entry.title: [yiisoft/yii2-dev] Yii Framework Code Injection
entry.content:
Yii 2.x before 2.0.15 allows remote attackers to inject unintended search conditions via a variant of the CVE-2018-7269 attack in conjunction with the Elasticsearch extension.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-8074
  • http://www.yiiframework.com/news/168/releasing-yii-2-0-15-and-database-extensions-with-security-fixes/
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-m2p5-fwp2-qcw2

entry.title: [pocketmine/pocketmine-mp] PocketMine-MP server crash with certain invalid JSON payloads in `LoginPacket` due to dependency vulnerability (again)
entry.content:
Impact

An attacker could crash the server by sending malformed JWT JSON in LoginPacket due to a security vulnerability in netresearch/jsonmapper, due to accepting NULL values in arrays whose types do not expect NULL.

Patches

This problem was fixed in 5.3.1 and 4.23.1 by updating JsonMapper to include the following commit: pmmp/netresearch-jsonmapper@4f90e8dab1c9df331fad7d3d89823404e882668c

Workarounds

A plugin may handle DataPacketReceiveEvent for LoginPacket and check that none of the input arrays contain NULL where it's not expected, but this is rather cumbersome.

References

  • https://github.com/pmmp/PocketMine-MP/security/advisories/GHSA-92jh-gwch-jq38
  • https://github.com/pmmp/netresearch-jsonmapper/commit/4f90e8dab1c9df331fad7d3d89823404e882668c
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-92jh-gwch-jq38
